plot: Emma Caulfield takes you on a life-changing journey of self discovery in this satirical comedy about helping an off-color actress make her way to fame.
plot_en: Emma Caulfield takes you on a life-changing journey of self discovery in this satirical comedy about helping an off-color actress make her way to fame.
plot_es: Emma Caulfield takes you on a life-changing journey of self discovery in this satirical comedy about helping an off-color actress make her way to fame.
title: Bandwagon: The Series
